title: COC Record
description: Managed Care Program Data format for continuity of care.

cocId.description: Unique identifier for each submitted continuity of care record

parentCocId.description: Links to Original Continuity of Care when either a Resubmission or Void is sent. Leave blank when Record type = Original

cocReceivedDate.description: The date the plan received the Continuity of Care record

cocType.description: Indicates the type of Continuity of Care record

cocDispositionIndicator.description: Indicate disposition of Continuity of Care Request

cocExpirationDate.description: The date the Continuity of Care expires

cocDenialReasonIndicator.description: The reason for the Continuity of Care request being denied
enum: No relationship between member and provider
Provider refused to work with managed care plan
Provider and plan did not agree to a rate

submittingProviderNpi.description: The ten-digit NPI of the provider who initiated or submitted the MER on behalf of the beneficiary

cocProviderNpi.description: The ten-digit NPI of the provider to which the beneficiary is linked resulting from the COC request

providerTaxonomy.description: Indicates the taxonomy of the provider

merExemptionId.description: The unique six-digit number assigned to the MER

exemptionToEnrollmentDenialCode.description: The denial code from the Exemption Transition Data Report

exemptionToEnrollmentDenialDate.description: Date the Exemption to Enrollment was denied

merCocDispositionIndicator.description: Indicate if and how MER COC is met
enum: The beneficiary was informed of his or her right of continued access
The beneficiary was informed that the MCP and the out-of-network FFS provider were unable to agree to a rate
The MCP has documented quality of care issues
The MCP made a good faith effort to contact the provider and the provider was non-responsive for 30 calendar days

merCocDispositionDate.description: The date on which The MER COC was determined either Met or Not Met

reasonMerCocNotMetIndicator.description: The reason for the MER COC not being met
enum: Member was not responsive to outreach
Plan did not complete outreach efforts

recordTypeDefinition.description: Indicates the type of record.  Note that Resubmission and Void records will be rejected if there is not a previously accepted Submission with an ID that matches the Parent ID

benefitTypeDefinition.description: Defines the type of benefit that the record addresses
enum: Managed Long Term Services and Supports

planCodeDefinition.description: The plan code for each county which plan operates in. Do not report subcontracting health plans separately

cinDefinition.description: The member's CIN number as nine-characters that consists of eight numbers and one letter. CINs must lead with a 9 and end with a letter character
